title: Monrjiall.Observation.found
body:
<<DialogueAction PuzzleManager sawHelmet>>
[[I found this helmet over by that tree... |Mimir.Observation.helmetAnd]]
<<DialogueAction PuzzleManager sawShield>>
[[There is a shield laying over there... |Mimir.Observation.shieldAnd]]
<<DialogueAction PuzzleManager sawGoblet>>
[[That goblet there is rather particular .|Mimir.Observation.gobletAnd]]
<<DialogueAction PuzzleManager sawBranch>>
[[That branch has caught my attention. |Mimir.Observation.shouldnt]]
<<DialogueAction PuzzleManager sawBench>>
[[That bench looks rather odd... |Mimir.Observation.benchAnd]]

title: Mimir.Observation.shouldnt
body:
It should not.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.maybe]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.maybe
body:
But maybe it came from a faraway land... 
in an epic journey too big for its little being to comprehend.

[[Mimir.Observation.didNot]]

title: Mimir.Observation.didNot
body:
It did not.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.travelling]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.travelling
body:
I can see it now, travelling with its partner...

[[Mimir.Observation.stop]]

title: Mimir.Observation.stop
body:
Let me stop you before you go any further. 
The branch is not from any other realm...
it will not relate to anything here... 
and it is not what you are looking for.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.believe]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.believe
body:
Don’t listen to him little branch! I believe in you!

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Mimir.Observation.helmetAnd
body:
Ok, and what else?

[[Monrjiall.Observation.helmetOptions]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.helmetOptions
body:
<<DialogueAction PuzzleManager $sawShield>>
[[This shield is also very similar and laying on the floor nearby. |Mimir.Observation.hsrelated]]
<<DialogueAction PuzzleManager $sawBranch>>
[[That branch over there! Ha! Once again, I prove myself in excellence of skill. |Mimir.Observation.hbrelated]]
[[I don’t anything else is relevant to this helmet. |Mimir.Observation.notCare]]

title: Mimir.Observation.hsrelated
body:
Well, yes, those two are most likely related. 
More so, they may have belonged to the same warrior.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.point]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.point
body:
Ha! Point for Monrjiall!

[[Mimir.Observation.hsrealm]]

title: Mimir.Observation.hsrealm
body:
Unfortunately, those don’t seem to have come from a different realm. 
They are very logical items to find in a battlefield. 
Keep looking, you were very close this time.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.close]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.close
body:
Close to what?

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Mimir.Observation.hbrelated
body:
How can those two items possibly be related??

[[Monrjiall.Observation.easy]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.easy
body:
That’s easy. 
That branch was clearly broken by that helmet... 
as the warrior wearing it fell from the top of the tree.

[[Mimir.Observation.climb]]

title: Mimir.Observation.climb
body:
Why would the warrior be up there? Vikings don’t climb.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.climber]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.climber
body:
For your information, I’m an excellent climber. 
I do it all the time... 
and break branches with my helmet constantly.

[[Mimir.Observation.notItems]]

title: Mimir.Observation.notItems
body:
I have so many questions right now. 
Regardless, those are not the items I was referring to. 
Let’s suppose they are related somehow... 
they do not belong to any other realms but this one.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.tie]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.tie
body:
Alright, we’ll call this one a stalemate.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Mimir.Observation.notCare
body:
Then we don’t particularly care for it, do we?

[[Monrjiall.Observaion.itForUs]]

title: Monrjiall.Observaion.itForUs
body:
Neither it for us, I think.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Mimir.Observation.shieldAnd
body:
Yes, something else?

<<DialogueAction PuzzleManager $sawHelmet>>
[[There’s also a helmet by a nearby tree. |Mimir.Observation.shrelated]]
<<DialogueAction PuzzleManager $sawBench>>
[[That bench has clearly been used to sit upon. |Mimir.Observation.accurate]]
[[What do you need something else for? That shield is magnificent! |Mimir.Observation.twoItems]]
